an9.42:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an9.42:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
an9.42:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an9.42:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
an9.42:5.1: ‘Sambādhe gataṃ okāsaṃ,
an9.42:6.1: Katamo, āvuso, sambādho, katamo sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā”ti?
an9.42:6.4: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, sotaviññeyyā saddā … pe …
an9.42:6.7: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
an9.42:6.8: Ime kho, āvuso, pañca kāmaguṇā sambādho vutto bhagavatā.
an9.42:7.3: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:7.6: Yadeva tattha vitakkavicārā aniruddhā honti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā … pe …
an9.42:8.3: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:8.6: Yadeva tattha pīti aniruddhā hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā … pe …
an9.42:9.3: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:9.6: Yadeva tattha upekkhāsukhaṃ aniruddhaṃ hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā … pe …
an9.42:10.3: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:10.6: Yadeva tattha rūpasaññā aniruddhā hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:11.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:11.5: Yadeva tattha ākāsānañcāyatanasaññā aniruddhā hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:12.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘anantaṃ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:12.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:12.5: Yadeva tattha viññāṇañcāyatanasaññā aniruddhā hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:13.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:13.5: Yadeva tattha ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā aniruddhā hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:14.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:14.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:14.5: Yadeva tattha nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññā aniruddhā hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:15.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
an9.42:15.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā nippariyāyenā”ti.
